thread.title: Apple Tree Yard finale ends with HUGE twist that absolutely no one saw coming!
thread.title_full: Apple Tree Yard finale ends with HUGE twist that absolutely no one saw coming!

author: Hayley Minn
title: Apple Tree Yard finale ends with HUGE twist that absolutely no one saw coming!
text:
Apple Tree Yard finale ends with HUGE twist that absolutely no one saw coming! Yvonne Carmichael and Mark Costley kept viewers gripped right up until the end   Take a sneak peek at the final episode of Apple Tree Yard   celebs   
Apple Tree Yard viewers were left in shock at the huge twist no one saw coming in tonight's finale. 
Lovers Mark Costley and Yvonne Carmichael - played incredibly by Ben Chaplin and Emily Watson - had been put on trial for conspiring to murder George Selway in the penultimate episode. 
Mark’s legal team pleaded diminished responsibility on the grounds of a “personality disorder” that rendered their client “mentally unstable”. 
Meanwhile, Yvonne remained adamant she had absolutely no idea he was going to kill George - and never asked him to do so. Read More Mark Costley was found guilty of manslaughter (Photo: BBC) Yvonne was found not guilty on both counts (Photo: BBC) Read More BBC drama Apple Tree Yard features public sex scenes - but what would happen if you got caught? 
After much anticipation, viewers finally found out the verdict. 
Yvonne was found not guilty for murder or manslaughter, but got a suspended sentence for perjury, and Mark was found guilty of manslaughter. 
But it didn't end there. 
Yvonne went to go visit Mark in prison, where he revealed he never told anyone what she said to him in the safe house. Read More Apple Tree Yard's harrowing rape scene left star Emily Watson 'traumatised' and deeply shaken But she HAD told him to kill George (Photo: BBC) 
A flashback then saw the couple lying in bed, with her telling him: "I want you to kill him. I want you to smash his f**king face in." 
AKA Yvonne HAD conspired to murder her rapist all along, and lied to absolutely everyone. 
Viewers were shocked at the twist no one saw coming. 
One said: "I did not see that coming. The twist at the end was so unexpected. That was an AMAZING finale." 
Another agreed: "Blinking heck!!! That was a brilliant ending - that last look to camera!! Pure genius ..." 
A third added: "Never saw that twist coming!!" Like us on Facebook
